# Dota2PlayerByTournamentStat

Player's statistics for a tournament

**Properties**

| Name        | Type                   | Required | Description     |

| games_count | int                    | ✅       | Number of games |
| totals      | Dota2PlayerStatsTotals | ✅       |                 |
